description: Entry point JavaScript file for a React-based web application, responsible for rendering the root component into the DOM.

methods.name: React.StrictMode
methods.description: A React component that helps with highlighting potential problems in an application during development.

methods.name: ReactDOM.createRoot
methods.description: Creates a root React node for rendering an app in a DOM element.

methods.name: root.render
methods.description: Renders React elements into the DOM.
